name: readeck
description: Readeck is a self-hosted bookmarking and read-it-later tool. It supports importing, tagging, and organizing articles with a distraction-free reading mode.
features: Article saving: Bookmark web pages and articles for reading later without distractions.
Reader mode: View saved content in a clean, distraction-free format without ads or sidebars.
Tag organization: Categorize bookmarks with tags for easy filtering and discovery.
Full-text search: Find saved articles by searching through titles, content, and tags.
Import bookmarks: Migrate existing bookmarks from Pocket, Instapaper, or browser exports.
Browser extension: Save articles with one click from Chrome, Firefox, or other browsers.
Offline reading: Access saved articles without an internet connection after initial download.
Archive management: Mark articles as read or archive them to keep your reading list organized.
RSS integration: Subscribe to feeds and save interesting articles automatically.
Mobile responsive: Read and manage bookmarks comfortably on smartphones and tablets.
Privacy focused: Store all reading data on your own server without tracking or analytics.
Export functionality: Download your bookmarks in standard formats for backup or migration.
